sourcesContent:
• What is Angular?
    Angular is a TypeScript-based open-source front-end web application platform led by the Angular Team at Google and by a community of individuals and corporations.
  • What are the advantages of using Angular?
    Some advantages of using Angular include its ability to create dynamic and scalable web applications, its use of declarative templates, and its powerful dependency injection system.
  • How can I get started with Angular?
    You can get started with Angular by following the official Angular tutorial on the Angular website, which covers the basics of Angular and guides you through building a simple app.
